changes: Added error state binding to startDate TextField with error prop and helperText
Added error state binding to estimatedEndDate TextField with error prop and helperText
Added disabled state to Create Project button conditioned on hasErrors(errors) function
file_insights.pattern: Standard Material-UI error display pattern with error boolean and helperText string
file_insights.significance: Completes form validation UI by displaying field-level errors to users

changes: Updated validateProjectForm function signature to use camelCase field names (startDate, estimatedEndDate) instead of snake_case (start_date, end_date)
Simplified date range validation logic - moved from conditional error assignment to direct assignment on estimatedEndDate field
Changed error assignment from end_date to estimatedEndDate
file_insights.pattern: Standardizing naming conventions from snake_case to camelCase for consistency with React/JavaScript conventions
file_insights.significance: Aligns validation utility with actual form field naming and simplifies error handling logic

patterns_discovered.description: Using error boolean prop and helperText string prop for inline field validation feedback

patterns_discovered.pattern: Button disable state based on form validity
patterns_discovered.description: Disabling submit button when hasErrors(errors) returns true, preventing invalid form submission
Updating function signatures and variable names from snake_case to camelCase for consistency across the codebase
patterns_discovered.usage_context: Validation utilities and form data handling

gotchas_discovered.description: Initial validation function used snake_case parameter names (start_date, end_date) while form used camelCase (startDate, estimatedEndDate)
gotchas_discovered.impact: Could cause validation to not trigger properly if not caught
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Updated function signature to match actual field names in form data

gotchas_discovered.description: Original code assigned date range error only to end_date field, but updated to assign to estimatedEndDate
gotchas_discovered.impact: Ensures error message appears on the correct field in the UI
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Simplified logic to directly assign to estimatedEndDate field

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully implemented error display for date fields in project creation form
key_achievements: Added Material-UI error props (error and helperText) to both date input fields
Implemented button disabling logic to prevent invalid form submission
Fixed field naming inconsistency between form data and validation function
Simplified date range validation logic for clarity
approach_outcome.completeness: All requirements met - error messages now display on date fields and submit button is disabled when errors exist

recommendations.suggestion: Ensure hasErrors() utility function is properly defined and exported from validation.ts
recommendations.rationale: Button disabling depends on this function; consistency check recommended

recommendations.suggestion: Audit entire codebase for remaining snake_case vs camelCase inconsistencies in form-related code
recommendations.rationale: Partial naming convention fix here suggests wider inconsistency that could cause similar issues elsewhere

recommendations.suggestion: Consider adding startDate field to date range validation errors as well, not just estimatedEndDate
recommendations.rationale: Users should know if start date is invalid, not just end date

recommendations.suggestion: Add unit tests for validateProjectForm with camelCase field names to prevent regression
recommendations.rationale: Recent naming change increases regression risk
